author: Sue M
title: Value for money
text:
This hotel is definitely value for money.
The rooms were small but perfectly formed with everything you would need and very clean but maybe could do with a spruce up at some point in the not too distant future.
Breakfast was excellent with both hot and cold choices.
Location was good, near to shops/small boutiques and plenty of restaurants within walking distance.
Metro is only a few hundred yards away.
The only downside is that although there is a bar in the hotel, it is situated downstairs a little out of the way and never manned, maybe because no-one used it, not sure but when we wanted a drink, we had to go and look for a member of staff to get a drink. Maybe they could make more of a feature of the bar area?
All in all a good hotel to stay in.
